record.field: - This offer is valid for (15) fifteen days, starting from date of sending the email. - The above prices are subject to any governmental fees and taxes levies. - Payment Terms: 2 months in advance shall be paid as a security deposit. - The above information are not an invoice but only an estimate for services requested. - This offer is for the Client whose details are mentioned above, and may not be used to serve other customers. - If you have any question about this invoice, please contact ......
